languages.text: "Оно питается людьми — следовательно хищник. Полагаю, это все, что нам надо знать, чтобы принять обоснованное решение об уничтожении этого создания".

traits.locale_text: "Оно питается людьми — следовательно хищник. Полагаю, это все, что нам надо знать, чтобы принять обоснованное решение об уничтожении этого создания".

languages.text: "It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."
languages.original_text: "Оно питается людьми — следовательно хищник. Полагаю, это все, что нам надо знать, чтобы принять обоснованное решение об уничтожении этого создания".

traits.locale_text: "It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."
"It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."
"It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."
"It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."
"It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."
"It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."
"It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."
"It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

languages.text: “它以人类受害者为食，因此可以归类为掠食者。我认为，只要知道这些信息，就可以做出‘消灭这只生物’的理性决策。”
languages.original_text: "It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

traits.locale_text: “它以人类受害者为食，因此可以归类为掠食者。我认为，只要知道这些信息，就可以做出‘消灭这只生物’的理性决策。”

languages.text: «Se alimenta de víctimas humanas, por lo que es un depredador. Creo que eso es todo lo que necesitamos saber para tomar la decisión racional de destruir a la criatura».
languages.original_text: "It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

traits.locale_text: «Se alimenta de víctimas humanas, por lo que es un depredador. Creo que eso es todo lo que necesitamos saber para tomar la decisión racional de destruir a la criatura».

languages.text: 「それは犠牲になった人間を餌とする、つまりプレデターだということです。合理的に考えて、この生物を殺す必要があると進言いたします」
languages.original_text: "It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

traits.locale_text: 「それは犠牲になった人間を餌とする、つまりプレデターだということです。合理的に考えて、この生物を殺す必要があると進言いたします」

languages.text: « Cette créature se nourrit de victimes humaines, ce qui fait d'elle un prédateur. Selon moi, nous n'avons pas besoin d'en savoir plus pour prendre la décision qui s'impose : celle de la détruire. »
languages.original_text: "It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

traits.locale_text: « Cette créature se nourrit de victimes humaines, ce qui fait d'elle un prédateur. Selon moi, nous n'avons pas besoin d'en savoir plus pour prendre la décision qui s'impose : celle de la détruire. »

languages.text: "Es ernährt sich von menschlichen Opfern, also ist es ein Raubtier. Ich denke, mehr müssen wir nicht wissen, um die rationale Entscheidung zu treffen, die Kreatur zu vernichten."
languages.original_text: "It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

traits.locale_text: "Es ernährt sich von menschlichen Opfern, also ist es ein Raubtier. Ich denke, mehr müssen wir nicht wissen, um die rationale Entscheidung zu treffen, die Kreatur zu vernichten."

languages.text: "İnsan kurbanlarla besleniyor, avcı bir tür olmalı. Bence mantıklı davranıp yaratığı ortadan kaldırmak için yeterli bir sebep."
languages.original_text: "It feeds on human victims, which makes it a predator. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

traits.locale_text: "İnsan kurbanlarla besleniyor, avcı bir tür olmalı. Bence mantıklı davranıp yaratığı ortadan kaldırmak için yeterli bir sebep."
